de.fhkiel.pepper.cms_lib.apps

Interface PepperAppController


  • public interface PepperAppController
    Interface of objects that can control the app handling. Implementing functions to load and start PepperApps.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.util.ArrayList<PepperAppInterface> pepperAppInterfaceListener 

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      default void addPepperAppInterfaceListener(PepperAppInterface listener) 
      void loadPepperApps()
      Function to load available PepperApp Notifies all listeners, if apps loaded.
      default void removePepperAppInterfaceListener(PepperAppInterface listener) 
      default boolean startPepperApp(PepperApp app)
      Starts a PepperApp via android.content.Intent.

      Starts a PepperApp via android.content.Intent.

    • Method Detail

      • startPepperApp

        boolean startPepperApp(PepperApp app,
                       User user)
        Starts a PepperApp via android.content.Intent.
        Parameters:
        app - PepperApp to start.
        user - User authenticated, null if none found.
        Returns:
        true if successful, false otherwise.
